Stopped in for dinner for two.  Everything was excellent!  We had chicken, pork, white rice, Spanish rice and beans.  Prices are very inexpensive!!  We will definitely be back!

This place is usually good, to be honest I've only ever had one bad experience with them, I ordered breakfast for delivery and both meals had bad potatoes, (the potatoes were blackish) of course I stopped ordering from there but I tried it since the staff and the cook changed, thus far I cant complain!
